open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Uitenhage
open.description: Please note users on the Frogfoot network in Uitenhage will experience limited to no connectivity due to an outage. Frogfoot engineers are attending to the fault. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Shingara Sands, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
